resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74186</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74186</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40dad197-738c-429e-2d55-61b9af03b106#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Virtuális tárlatrendezés</string>
            <string language="en">Virtual art exhibition pettig up</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Virtuelles Kunstausstellung pettig oben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pettig virtuel d'exposition d'art vers le haut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pettig virtual do exhibition de arte acima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pettig virtuale di mostra di arte in su</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικονική έκθεση τέχνης pettig επάνω</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pettig virtual de la exposición de arte para 
arriba</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tanuló feladata a képek közül két halmazba kiválasztani a Magyar Nemzeti Galériába illetve az Esztergomi Keresztény Múzeumba tartozóakat</string>
            <string language="en">The task of the student is to separate the pictures that belong either to the Hungarian National Gallery or to the Christian Museum of Esztergom into two sets</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">bizánci művészet,  Pantokratór,  Krisztus,  ötvösség,  elefántcsont,  diptychon,  </string>
            <string language="en">Bizantine art, Pantokrator, Christ, goldsmith's work, ivory, diptychon,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Aufgabe des Kursteilnehmers ist, die 
Abbildungen zu trennen, die entweder der ungarischen nationalen 
Galerie oder dem christlichen Museum von Esztergom in zwei einsetzen 
gehören</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le charger de l'étudiant doit séparer les 
images qui appartiennent à la galerie nationale hongroise ou au 
musée chrétien d'Esztergom deux en jeux</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A tarefa do estudante é separar os retratos que 
pertencem à galeria nacional hungarian ou ao museu christian de 
Esztergom em dois jogos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'operazione dell'allievo è di separare le 
immagini che appartengono alla galleria nazionale ungherese o al museo
cristiano di Esztergom in due serie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η στοιχειώδης εργασία του σπουδαστή είναι να χωρίσει 
τις εικόνες που ανήκουν είτε στην ουγγρική εθνική στοά είτε στο
χριστιανικό μουσείο Esztergom σε δύο σύνολα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La tarea del estudiante es separar los cuadros que
pertenecen a la galería nacional húngara o al museo cristiano de 
Esztergom en dos conjuntos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bizantine kunst, Pantokrator, Christ, Arbeit des 
Goldschmieds, Elfenbein, diptychon,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art de Bizantine, Pantokrator, le Christ, le travail de 
l'orfèvre, ivoire, diptychon,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arte de Bizantine, Pantokrator, Christ, trabalho do 
goldsmith, marfim, diptychon,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte di Bizantine, Pantokrator, Christ, lavoro 
dell'orafo, avorio, diptychon,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνη Bizantine, Pantokrator, Χριστός, εργασία του 
χρυσοχόου, ελεφαντόδοντο, diptychon,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arte de Bizantine, Pantokrator, Cristo, trabajo del 
orfebre, marfil, diptychon,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74186</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40dad197-738c-429e-2d55-61b9af03b106&v=1&b=1</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
"
